author.persName: Mir Khwand (Muhammad b. Khawand Shah b. Mahmud).

msItem.title: Rauzat us-Safa. Vol. III.
msItem.note: [As Rieu (i, p. ) and Ethe. The surviving portion of the original first folio, with the beginning of the text, is bound upside down after the last folio of text. In the margin is a note: The illuminated frontispiece of this volume was given to Mr. Jas. Forbes to insert as a specimen in his great work - by C.W.M. May 18 - 1813. Defective at beginning. The first two folios, now standing first and written in naskh, are not part of this volume and are concerned with later Timurid history. Extra leaves are inserted at beginning and end from other partly written manuscripts. Inside back cover: armorial bookplate of Sir Cha. Warre Malet History of the twelve Imams and the Urnavi and 'Abbasi Khalifs to A.H. 656. Ruled margins. Headings and punctuation in red.
msItem.incipit: Hamd wa thana'i ki musabbihan i mala' i a'la

listBibl.bibl: As for Codrinngton/Reade No 29. For Sir Alexander Malet's gift see the Transactions for 1830, pp. xxxiv-xxxv.

bindingDesc.p: Oriental red leather binding with blind-tooled margin.

acquisition.p: Presented by Sir A. Malet, Bart.

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org
